channel.title: Megascape 503
channel.description:
Are you tired of all the spam here (for example: my post)? Sick of the amount of newbs still stuck with 377- clients?
Then hit up: http://www.megascape.org
Megascape is a brand new 503 server, which is online 24/7! The client, also works in fullscreen: [img]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp169/PierceTurner/pic1dg3.png[/img]
It's new and already has 100+ forums members, with hundreds of in-game players!
Heres some snapshots some of the players have made. [img]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp169/PierceTurner/thRunescape_controls_emotes_skillca.gif[/img]
[img]http://i279.photobucket.com/albums/kk129/Noosy1/JC-SCAPE/Attack.gif[/img]
[img]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp169/PierceTurner/bountypenaltych1.png[/img]
[img]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp169/PierceTurner/508koolpicca0.png[/img]
Download link, (Click "Megascape, Play Now!"
[img]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp169/PierceTurner/megascape.png[/img]
If the link is dead/not working, you can download the client on our forums at: http://www.megascape.org

item.title: Megascape 503
